snippet.title: Burly Men at Sea - Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming 9/29/2016 for PC/Mac and mobile!

Pre-order from the Humble Store: http://humblebundle.com/store/p/burlymenatsea_storefront
Wishlist on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/403290
Add on Itch.io: https://brainbrain.itch.io/burlymenatsea
Sign up for an occasional email in a bottle: http://burlymenatsea.com

Burly Men at Sea is a folktale about a trio of large, bearded fishermen who step away from the ordinary to seek adventure. SXSW Gamer's Voice Award nominee, and official selection of both EGX Rezzed Leftfield Collection and the Indie MEGABOOTH at PAX West.

Set in early 20th-century Scandinavia, the game's story branches through discovery in a series of encounters with creatures from folklore. You play as storyteller and wayfinder, shaping the narrative around the characters through interaction with their environment.
